mapper.select: select a.no, title, contents, hit, date_format(reg_date, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') as regDate,g_no,o_no,depth,user_no,b.name, (select ceil(count(*)/5) from board) as total from board a ,user b where a.user_no=b.no order by g_no desc, o_no asc limit #{page},5
mapper.insert: insert into board select null, ?, ?, 0, now(), MAX(g_no) + 1, 1, 1, ? from board
